page.title: 10LEISURE
page.content: A typical family's recreation includes: father - garden, football, television, bee-keeping. Mother - pottery, reading, music, drawing, yoga,concerts. Son - piano, football, collecting stamps, post cards and programmes. Fishing television and scouting. Daughter - Guides, piano, horse riding, television, reading. Some children also attend classes at the Grantham Leisure Centre for athletics, swimming, basket ball and gymnastics. Other children attend dancing classes in Grantham. Villagers use the village hall for youth club, W.I. football, dancing, bingo, junior marching band, senior citizens and play groups.
